landing.title: Discover Your MBTI Type
landing.subtitle: A quick, delightful personality test that reveals your 16-type MBTI personality in just 1-2 minutes.

about.title: About MBTI
about.description: The Myers-Briggs Type Indicator (MBTI) is a personality assessment tool that categorizes individuals into 16 distinct personality types based on four dimensions: Extraversion/Introversion, Sensing/Intuition, Thinking/Feeling, and Judging/Perceiving.
about.disclaimer: This is a quick test for entertainment purposes. For professional assessment, please consult certified MBTI practitioners.
about.privacyText: We do not store your test results. All data is processed locally in your browser.
